Detailed Description

Class that inherits from TCPSocket to create different kind of sockets.

Member Function Documentation

virtual TCPSocket* DataSocket::accept (   )  [virtual]
 

Virtual function that creates a DataSocket object instead of a general TCPSocket.

The Session of the new object is the same as of the old DataSocket.

Returns:
A TCPSocket pointer to the {DataSocket} created. NULL if method failed.

Reimplemented from TCPSocket.

isabBoxSession session

void DataSocket::setSession (  isabBoxSession *  session  ) 
 

Sets the session for this socket, old session is just dropped not deleted.

Parameters:
session The new session.
